dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3604201P] [Fwd: [Fwd: Copywrite infringement - legaladder.com]]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 23, 2007 12:57 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3604201P] [Fwd: [Fwd: Copywrite infringement -
legaladder.com]]

==== Forwarded Ticket ====

MIME element (text/plain) 
I still have not received a response to my complaint, below.  I'd  
appreciate a quick resolution to this issue. 
 
Best, 
 
Michelle MacPhearson 
 
-------- Original Message -------- 
Subject:         [Fwd: Copywrite infringement - legaladder.com] 
Date:         Wed, 21 Mar 2007 15:38:57 -0700 
From:         ms65442@gmail.com <ms65442@gmail.com> 
To:         legal@theplanet.com 
 
 
 
I have not received a response to the message below and am re-sending in

hopes of contacting someone. 
 
 
 
-------- Original Message -------- 
Subject:         Copywrite infringement - legaladder.com 
Date:         Tue, 20 Mar 2007 13:53:37 -0700 
From:         Michelle MacPhearson <mam@michellemacphearson.com> 
To:         legal@theplanet.com 
 
 
 
The gentleman @ legaladder.com, which ThePlanet is hosting, has taken  
the entire contents of my salespage (  
http://www.badderadder.com/2006/04/20/add-thousands-of-myspace-friends-a
nd-automatically-send-messages-comments-and-bulletins/  
) and put it onto his site, right down to the client testimonials. 
 
They've even gone as for as to forget to edit MY name out of the  
contant, as seen in this paragraph, " 
 
My name is *Michelle MacPhearson* and I have made a recent discovery  
that can help you to quickly and easily add thousands of friends to your

MySpace profile, send Messages, post Comments and Bulletins, and blast  
out your Event invitations - *all like clockwork*! 
 
Whether you are:" 
 
LegalAdder.com is not Michelle MacPhearson... I am.  Legaladder.com has

no right or permission to be using my content or representing themselves

as me.. 
 
Please remove the offending content immediately. 
 
Best, 
 
Michelle MacPhearson
